lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the same opportunities I have.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a field called knowledge translation. I help bridge the gap between what we know (scientific research) and what we do (policies and programs).

lender.loan_because: I care for the people I can and cannot see :)

lender.name: liz

lender.occupational_info: i help idiots fix machines they broke. over the phone. its less fun than you'd think.

lender.name: Craig and Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to support the entrepreneurial spirit around the world. Entrepreneurs are the reason we have what we do today!
lender.occupational_info: I plan dinners, meetings and social events for clients of my company.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in finance and philanthropy.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver medical equipment to people's homes to help them be more independent.

lender.name: Tiago
lender.loan_because: Economic Development in deprived areas of the world will only be achieved if the Developed World helps.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies reduce risk caused by Software

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: The world is flat. Improving the lives of others improves our own.
lender.occupational_info: Build computer programs and systems that allow people to communicate

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: People have helped and supported me in the past, and I feel like returning the favor.

lender.name: gyefree
lender.occupational_info: Get your bootie here and win some cash!

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Others need this more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: Information is critical to knowledge, I enable remote information sharing.

lender.name: Erik Bond
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and understand that without the opportunity to pursue your passion there is no growth.
lender.occupational_info: I print large graphics for advertising purposes such as billboards (signs) in order to let people know about your product.

lender.name: Troop
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference and make the world better.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up, not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I love the stories and want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a businessman in Chicago, Illinois

lender.name: JPR-CSR
lender.loan_because: it's more sustainable than giving money away. Lending gives others the chance to lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: EFREN
lender.loan_because: I want to play a role in helping strengthen local economies, families, and communities throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank in San Francisco helping to manage the Bank's risks in certain areas.

lender.name: Vern
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Jared
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I loan because I feel I should and because I am able. Hopefully by providing others with an opportunity to succeed, they will in turn help others when they are able.
lender.occupational_info: I write code for computer programs.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to thank the people who have helped me and asked nothing in return but that I help others.
lender.occupational_info: I translate foreign languages

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I love helping people to be independent and realize their dreams. Kiva is among the highest and best uses of the internet. We are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist working in physical and virtual media.

lender.name: TinaDee
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I create virtual reality landscapes.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have the ability to.
lender.occupational_info: Spanish and Microbiology Student Research involving the bacteria pseudomonas aeruginosa in persons with cystic fibrosis.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.occupational_info: I manage a doctors office in Washington, DC

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I believe in fairness in opportunity and I think it's good to share when you can-it makes better use of our resources, helps other people live independently and creates a global sense of community.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and also study Psychology.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I want to help -- even if it's in a very small way.
lender.occupational_info: I write about the environment.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I help other gain financial freedom so they have more time to spend with their families

lender.name: Little Red Reading Club
lender.loan_because: We are a small reading club. Some members are among the working poor in the United States. We lend because we must help one another in order to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: I want to help others reach their goals and be able to help their own communities with their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: My company helps other companies improve their employees' skills.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to feel like I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I assist small business clients with their banking needs including deposits, loans, and other services.

lender.name: Nakita
lender.loan_because: I want to let people know that just a little means a lot to someone. As a witness of just needing a little help to go far, I understand the struggle. Everyone just needs that little boost for success.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student at Savannah State University. I'm torn between in majoring in Finance or Marketing. I would love to get any kind of advice from anyone who is interested.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: As an American citizen I feel it necessary to reach out to other people in other countries. We all deserve a chance to provide for our family and ourselves. I feel proud knowing I'm helping people. For those who I have loaned to, I say good luck and bring joy to other people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work with pipes to deliver water to peoples homes and to convey the waste water from peoples home to a save location for the treatment of the waste water.This is important work for this to be done properly to ensure the health, safety, and welfare of all people.

lender.name: J. R. W.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university library and am a student.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It makes a real difference to real people.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: difficult

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Travel is one of my passions. Seeing small parts of the world makes me want to share in a small way with others who need a little hand.
lender.occupational_info: I see with my camera's eye details that others sometimes overlook.

lender.name: Alexandre
lender.loan_because: You must be the change you wish to see in the world

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: Grassroots makes a difference
lender.occupational_info: Helping injured and sick

lender.name: GPCKids
lender.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are the children of Germantown Presbyterian Church in Tennessee, USA.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: A little help goes a long way.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: There are always people who are more in need even if you are poor
lender.occupational_info: I help older workers develop job skills and obtain employment

lender.name: Jessy & Frank
lender.loan_because: these people have great plans!

lender.name: Deeje
lender.loan_because: This seems like a good way to really help someone and have the good ripple out to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hospice social worker. I work with the dying and the bereaved.

lender.name: The Hefferns
lender.loan_because: We loan because we like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Mom is a nurse. Dad is a policeman. The children are students in school.

lender.name: CHRISTIAN
lender.loan_because: Sometimes it takes another person saying "I believe in you" to give someone the confidence to even try to succeed. I applaud anyone who tries to make their life and the community they live in better. I know that this may never be a utopian world but maybe helping one person at a time we can make it just a bit brighter.
lender.occupational_info: We at Johnson Creek Smoke Juice make the very best juice for all electronic smoking devices, a promising alternative to cigarettes that contains 7 components compared to the 4000 of a regular cigarette.

lender.name: Arturo
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to lend money to people who really need it to create a lucrative bussiness. And it makes me feel good inside to help in some sort of way.
lender.occupational_info: Laborous. But happy to have my health to be able to do it.

lender.name: Catz
lender.loan_because:
I feel fortunate to be able to loan.
"You must be the change you want to see in the world." -- Gandhi

lender.name: ellie
lender.loan_because: When someone builds a better life, the entire world benefits.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business around the whole world and try to help solve some of the poverty and hunger that is all too prevalent and unfortunately forgotten about by many of us in the United States.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: it makes sense.

lender.name: sue
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of empowering people to be contributing members of their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. My career included working with victims of crimes, youth at risk and as a mediator in the juvenile court.

lender.name: Jono
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone in the world should have the opportunity to do something they are passionate about and willing to work hard for.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: My wife and I care.
lender.occupational_info: I manage 1500 computers for students to use at a University.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I´m a follower of Jesus.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: it's my duty to help those who I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach music to elementary school students.

lender.name: Elvira
lender.loan_because: I want women in the Middle East to have the right to have a business and a life without having to depend on anybody for handouts.
lender.occupational_info: I work with poor people with health needs and help them find medical coverage to assist the entire family

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupational_info: I help process insurance claims for people when they have an auto accident.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to do this.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the HR compliance and audit program for the State of Arizona.

lender.name: itcn
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: ITCN specializes in optimizing your online marketing efforts so that your website becomes more visible and works harder for you.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: If you're in a position where you can help someone else you should.
lender.occupational_info: I help computers with people problems.

lender.name: Eli
lender.occupational_info: I go and traing people in safety techniques.

lender.name: Andrés
lender.loan_because: I feel sympathy for my fellow human beings. We only have each other in this world, so we should do all we can to make each other's lives better.

lender.name: William
lender.occupation: U.S. Coast Guard Helicopter Rescue Swimmer
lender.loan_because: I don't get paid a lot and know what it feels like to not live an upper-class life. Doing this makes my soul feel a little richer.
lender.occupational_info: I jump out of helicopters to save people that are drowning. I also provide medical assistance to boaters and rescue people stranded inland.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I'm incredibly lucky and have had many opportunities, so it's my responsibility to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I go to college in the northeast and am currently studying Political Science and Philosophy.

lender.name: Miss
lender.loan_because:
instead of giving someone in need a fish for a day, or even teaching them how to fish...first they need to have a net to cast upon the waters.
I learned in a cultural geography course at college that microlending was one of the best ways that women were able to lift themselves out of dire poverty, and make a huge impact on bettering their lives.
I'm a business woman myself, and I'm happy to do what I can to assist women throughout the world in becoming independent and self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info:
I perform sexual services over the telephone. Women performing sexual services (even legally) for money is a VERY taboo thing in most areas of the world. I am extremely fortunate to live in a society, which while it does not embrace such work, allows it legally. I am also fortunate to live in a society where I run my own business doing so, and am not exploited.
I enjoy my work, and it is a job that I *choose* to do. It is not a job everyone would choose to do, but I contribute here to give women the same choices I have on what work they wish to do.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: Just because I can't get credit doesn't mean others should be stopped in their tracks by that.
lender.occupational_info: I help people figure out how to fix their home and sell them the tools to do so.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Even though freelance writers aren't the wealthiest people in the world, it's important to give back. While I'm making my dreams come true, I'm also helping others to achieve dreams of their own. I love that Kiva gives average people like me the ability to really help others in a direct and meaningful way.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles for magazines, newspapers and websites in the U.S. and Canada.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: people have always been generous to me all along the way....

lender.name: T.R. Khadija
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the local university, specializing in Latin American History, Religious Studies, and Spanish.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I am encouraged by providing people the resources and tools to help themselves. Life presents us every day with a choice. The choice to give or the choice to recieve. Today I choose to give.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Independent Consultant with Arbonne International. I work from home, selling botanically based natural skin care, and help other women start there home based businesses as well. It is an amazing opportunity for freedom and CHOICE, which enables me to GIVE in return.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I write about technical products and services, helping people to understand the value of my company's products and services.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I and my wife want to start a chicken rearing business .The income i get from working freelance isn't enough to pay school fees for 2 kids and feed a family of 5, let alone pay bills.we are confident after a year in this project, things will change.
lender.occupational_info: Am a freelance at my work, at the moment it is on and off and unreliable.

lender.name: Espen
lender.loan_because: I hope that my contribution will make a difference!

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I love my fellow human beings.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software. When I'm not writing software, I draw comics.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: To make an impact and to encourage the world to be ambitious and to strive to be better.
lender.occupational_info: I work to keep my wife happy! ;)

lender.name: Brenden family
lender.loan_because: We care!
lender.occupational_info: We work to improve human capital and software solutions.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is a human responsibility to help others who are less fortunate than us.

lender.name: ISL Mi-Fi Fund
lender.loan_because:
We are a fund run by students from the International School of Lausanne, Switzerland. We collect loans from fellow students, teachers, and parents in our community to make loans to people across the world, embodying our international spirit.
We want to loan to those less fortunate than ourselves. We believe the world should help those who put their hands out asking for a helping hand, not just a hand out. We admire those who seek to improve their standing in life by working hard and want to help them reach their goal. The satisfaction of knowing one is helping is reward enough and although micro-finance is not the solution to world poverty it is certainly a huge leap forwards.
lender.occupational_info: The ISL MI-FI Fund was set up and is run by students from the International School of Lausanne. Our goal is to teach our community about micro financing and how our loans can help small entrepreneurs around the world. We gather loans from students, teachers and parents in our community and reach entrepreneurs around the world through Kiva.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: „If you wanna make the world a better place, take a look at yourself and make a change.“

lender.name: Gali
lender.loan_because: The world is not a fair place.

lender.name: Walt
lender.loan_because: I served in Vietnam with the United States Army in 1971-1972.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Sometimes just a little help to start is all someone needs to be successful and independent.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Every little bit of help can go a long way, anywhere in the world. Besides, it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the airline industry!

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian and God has blessed me financially. I believe in showing God's love by sharing my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle school in an upper middle class suburban community. I teach sixth grade art to about 120 students a day. I get a new group every 6 weeks. I love my job! I also create my own artwork.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunities I have had and want to help others with entrepreneurial interests
lender.occupational_info: My company installs heating/cooling and plumbing systems in large commercial buildings.

lender.name: John Grebe
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian and I care about the poor because God cares about the poor.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that just a few dollars a week can dramatically change a person, a family, a community's way of life. I feel very blessed to have been born and raised in Australia.
lender.occupational_info: I edit a weekly lifestyle magazine.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I read Yunis' Banker to the Poor and understand the impact that microcredit can make on the lives of the poor
lender.occupational_info: I educate underprivileged urban students in NY. I teach English Language and English Literature.

lender.name: arun
lender.loan_because: Helping people gives me imense pleasure and development of society.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software engineer, I involve in development of applications.

lender.name: Kathy Reid
lender.loan_because: The world should be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I investigate and resolve problems with computers.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate that I am able to to contribute to others around the world.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I've seen how much impact these loans can have in developing regions.
lender.occupational_info: Computer stuff

lender.name: Antonio
lender.loan_because: I've seen first hand how a small loan can go a long way towards improving someones life. All said and done, it's just the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: When not traveling, I work as a computer analyst for a large electric utility.

lender.name: Mari-Ann
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who makes an effort to make their own business

lender.name: James & Anne
lender.loan_because: We have more than we need.

lender.name: Nana
lender.loan_because: ...where's the fun in having it all to myself?

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: It feels great to donate in a way that gives someone a hand up, not just a handout. I also love the news updates about the repayments made and what the loanee's life is like.
lender.occupational_info: I work for myself as a freelance writer and photographer and I work for a local school as an ESL teacher too. I used to be a librarian before I started to live abroad, following my dream of living a life filled with travel and adventure.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I believe in sustainable development through accountability and transparency.

lender.name: bill & gwen
lender.loan_because: We are happy to be able to help.

lender.name: Gay
lender.loan_because: This is such an easy and inexpensive way to help people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the budget area for Minnesota Management and Budget, and also translate Italian and Spanish into English.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think that one should not only live and let live but live and help live.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: All people deserve a chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 14 to 18 year old students.

lender.name: Cathleen
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help people realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and photographer and mostly write about adventure travel, health and lifestyle. My main focus is introducing people through my words and images to the concept of sustainability.

lender.name: John & Mary
lender.loan_because: Because we are able to do so

lender.name: Hollitz Boys
lender.loan_because: I can, and I want to share.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I like to help and see others succeed and advance themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites.

lender.name: Sophomore
lender.loan_because: We are a group of High School Sophomores at Peak to Peak Charter School in Lafayette, Colorado. We want to make a difference in our community of human beings.
lender.occupational_info: We are students striving to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It's an effective, direct way to help other people in a fair and transparent manner.
lender.occupational_info: I market books online for a publisher affiliated with a major American university.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: Showing someone kindness is the best way to spread peace around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher and I teach American Sign Language. I am also an interpreter for the Deaf.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: what goes around, comes around.

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research with infants and children, and I teach psychology to college students. I'm also a momma to two little girls.

lender.name: Alanna
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computer hardware and software, design web pages, edit and lay out text documents, write technical briefs, all sorts of things.

lender.name: Trae
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: Educating people through the medium of travel. The world's greatest educator.

lender.name: Lucas Suazo
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the communitty and make a positive difference.

lender.name: Mike V
lender.loan_because: I think that the greatest potential for growth is with the individual.
lender.occupational_info: I am a GIS Coordinator. I help to collect information to make maps and systems that display and interact with location.

lender.name: Caitlynn
lender.loan_because: I want to help others feel more empowered!
lender.occupational_info: helping others help themselves

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I did loan because Instead of tearing the world apart I choose to try and help people who need it most.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: The life stories are fascinating and I am happy to be able to do a little bit to help people reach their personal goals.
lender.occupational_info: I excavate archaeological sites and teach archaeology and ancient history to university students.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.occupational_info: I conduct insurance fraud and mortgage fraud investigations, as well as private legal investigations and skip tracing.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can, I should, I want to and I think it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Camilla & Thomas
lender.loan_because: It makes us feel good to know that, in some small way, we're helping people build a better life for themselves, that we might contribute to other people's dreams and everyday lives. We hope our contributions through Kiva will help in making other people happy too!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.' Matthew 25:39-41

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: It's a chance to give a helping hand to people just like a helping hand was extended to me during a rough period in my life.

lender.name: Annie & Jane
lender.loan_because: we can't think of a better way to spend $25.
lender.occupational_info: We are trying to learn about the world :)

lender.name: Mitchell
lender.loan_because: I have become increasingly aware of my social responsibility to promote, advocate, and act on the belief that everyone deserves equal opportunities in life. Kiva.org is just one organization that makes this possible. My FULL passion lies with the World University Service of Canada, a NGO which promotes human development through educational opportunities! Check us out at www.wusc.ca!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently enrolled in a Masters program at the University of Guelph in Computer Science. My research focus is aiming towards Intelligent/Adaptive Education Services, Educational Technology, Open Source Innovations, and International Development.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me, so I bless others in His name.
lender.occupational_info: I make people aware of businesses whose services they may want to use. I help my husband with a construction company also.

lender.name: Richard/Sandra
lender.loan_because: It's good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Richard is a retired plumber, and Sandra works in an office environment supporting three departments.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of helping someone make their dream possible.
lender.occupational_info: Retail and full time high school student.

lender.name: Julie Hanna
lender.loan_because: it helps level the playing field
lender.occupational_info: technology entrepreneur that is helping other entrepreneur's change the world

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I have more than enough in money and opportunity and want to return the cosmic favor.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: it's a worthwhile way to spend my money - lending it to someone that needs it more than I do.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference in another persons life and for them to better themself.
lender.occupational_info: I am outgoing, i enjoy finding different ways on bettering myself an d my job, and the things I do. I always enjoy meeting different people. I always love to get ahead of the game so I don't have to rush to get everything done at once. I am very creative. I am 42 year old and I started my own business to because I have a medical condition that causes me not to drive. The company I work for has lost the contract and I am not sure if they will be in business much longer.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I treat those around me in need as I would my savior Jesus Christ

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: I give good give
lender.occupational_info: i create visually in print in order to convey a message or sell a product

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: empowering people to reach their dreams is a dream in and of itself.
lender.occupational_info: My job involves building systems that allow companies to share data across the world.

lender.name: Maish
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I create graphics, print materials, and websites. I'm also a student.

lender.name: Mikell
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to be successful. I am especially interested in Mongolia because I lived there for 2 years and have many friends there.
lender.occupational_info: I design logos, websites, catalogs, products, etc for my clients.

lender.name: Tina
lender.occupational_info: I work from my house, on the computer. I check the quality of other people's work.

lender.name: Page
lender.loan_because: I want my children to participate with me in the joy of giving. Together they will learn that it just takes a little to make a huge difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a dedicated Mother

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: I have struggled as a single mother, and now have a decent job. I want to help others become self sufficient.
